title: Commercial invoices for customs clearance
dataVerified: Exporter, importer, consignee, goods description, HS codes, declared value
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents customs fraud (undervalued goods). Domain binding verifies exporter. Customs audit trail. Prevents tariff evasion. Anti-dumping duty compliance. Multi-page: Commercial invoices often multi-page - per-page verification prevents altering item values.
